comment_body:
Good German demons, they know that being hungry while driving is unsafe, so they travelled from hell just to give our narrator foods in his stomach!

German demons aside, story could use a little bit of paragraphing (is that even a word?). I have heard about this kind of story in my country, but all the story will have a line where "the fried noodle is worms!!1!", so thank god this doesn't have the same line. Cool story though.
